Blog.post: and more grrrs . Some times i cant beleive some people. What is a friend to do in this situation. I really dont know. I dont know if i should care. She just means so much! I can't Stand It ne more -Danny

Hey, This is all so boring... I have nothing to do. I just watched president regans funeral thingy.... he was president the year i was born. So it kinda means a little bit, not much. I played risk. My dad won, he beat me and Tom, my twin really bad. I read the book The Slippery Slope by Lemony Snicket A certain person that i really wanted to date told me that she wants to just be friends. I'm totally ok w/ it. :-) (its really ok maggie if ur reading this) I'm boerd and the dinner mom is cooking smells good g2g, ttyl, ttfn, -Danny

I am so so so so so so so so so so boerd. It's so cold and rainy up here. I bought risk :-D I love that game, I've played 2 games, one my sisters kinda made us start a new one and the other we all kinda got tierd of it..... I'm really really boerd and I have nothing to do. Hey, If you all have some free time download these songs! Boys of Summer - The Ataris Broken Promise Ring - The Ataris There are a couple more but I dont have time to write them. Talk to you all later, -Danny

Hey, I'm about to go to my cabin..... spam my email box!! danlock2@yahoo.com!!! Well, how should i get my parents 2 let me date again. There is this wonderful girl that i want to date...... but im not allowed, you know who you are, I love you, really i do! Tell me what 2 write about. If u all wanna know what happened between me and mandy that made us break up tell me! I love you all, Danny

Hey everybody, This is my first post! I'm really bored and I'm leaving for my cabin, in Brainerd, MN; today at 3. Or 4 with my mother....... She always makes us late for everything. I'm really bored :-) I have nothing to do. I went to a movie with my friend Maggie, that was way fun! I got in a couple of word fights with my best friend and ex-girlfriend, Mandy. I thinks it's ok now, she just doesn't trust me. We would probably still be together had we not if 'stuff had not happened. I wish it hadn't. I used to really not like her new boyfriend Nic Lake, but i figured out that hes ok. Well I have to go out side away from the computer *shudder* on this very awesome day! I love all of you, -Danny

urlLink I love bees O wow! this is acctually kinda funny :-D..... This is a site that is the actually a publicity ploy by Microsoft/Bungie! The creators of Halo and Halo 2! Right besides that: I won't be updating for a week (10 days) because of a church trip! called caravan! pray that it goes well! Um..... life stinks as usual... i need to go... finish packing! love y'all, danny
